subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Djokovic, who had a chance to become the first man to have won all nine of the elite ATP Masters Series events, has lost all five times he has made the tournament’s final, three times to Federer.
snippet: Djokovic, who had a chance to become the first man to have won all nine of the elite ATP Masters Series events, has lost all five times he has made the tournament’s final, three times to Federer.
